# Learn Farsi (learnfarsi.app)

## About
Learn Farsi is a free online platform for learning Persian (Farsi) vocabulary, grammar, and the Persian alphabet. It uses spaced repetition to help learners remember words long-term. The platform is completely free with no subscriptions or paywalls.

## Features
- Structured vocabulary lessons organized by theme (greetings, food, family, travel, etc.) and difficulty level (beginner to expert)
- Persian grammar lessons covering verb conjugation, sentence structure, tenses, and more
- Full Persian alphabet guide with all 32 letters, their four positional forms, and example words
- Daily practice mode with spaced repetition algorithm that adapts to each learner
- Progress tracking with XP points, streaks, and leveling system
- Interactive quizzes with multiple choice, typing, and matching exercises
- Both Farsi script and phonetic transliteration for every word
- Example sentences with translations for contextual learning
- Free forever — no subscriptions, no paywalls, no ads

## Who It's For
- Complete beginners who want to start learning Farsi/Persian
- Heritage speakers looking to improve their vocabulary
- Travelers planning to visit Iran, Afghanistan, or Tajikistan
- Anyone interested in Persian culture and language
- Students supplementing their formal Farsi studies

## Key Facts
- Persian (Farsi) is spoken by over 110 million people worldwide
- Farsi uses a modified Arabic script written right-to-left
- The Persian alphabet has 32 letters, including 4 unique to Persian (پ, چ, ژ, گ)
- Farsi is the official language of Iran, and Dari/Tajik are closely related variants spoken in Afghanistan and Tajikistan
